overview: In this tale of submission and dominance, a young woman and a wealthy businessman meet and fall in love. The life of Alison appears mindane and stressful, until she spills a drink on Patrick. Used to having his way, the unforeseen incident sparks Patrick's interest in her and leads to the romancing, and eventual overwhelming sexual domination of Alison. The unlikely pair's BDSM sexual escapades are supported by Alison's friend, Tiffany, who in true comic form, cares more about the sports cars owned by the man she has sex with than their personalities. Patrick ushers Alison into the world of BDSM and shows her how emotions and sexual games can go hand in hand.
title: Black & Blue
